Comment 2: 
Here is a minified example:

package main

func foo() {
        var x = []int{1, 2, 3}
        var y = [][][]int{}
        select {
        case _ = <-([]chan int{})[cap(make(chan bool, y[0][x[1]][x[1]]))]:
        default:
        }
}

A variant of this example will make 6g crash too:

package main

func foo() {
	var x = []int{1, 2, 3}
	var y = [][][]int{}
	select {
	case _ = <-([]chan []float64{})[
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                cap(make(chan bool,
                    y[0][x[1]][x[1]] )) )) )) )) )) )) ))]:
	default:
	}
}
